name: Indoor/Outdoor Sporting Courts
text:
Split Rock Resort features a variety of indoor and outdoor sporting courts for volleyball, basketball, tennis, badminton, bocce, racquetball and baseball.

  • (570) 722-9111
  • $20/hour
  • Indoor Tennis & Basketball Courts:
    Sun - Thurs: 10am-11pm
    Fri - Sat: 10am-Midnight
    Outdoor Tennis & Recreation:
    Daily: 10am-9pm
